title: Where does 'Hamilton' rank in the best Broadway show ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s too early to say if it will be a game-changer in the way that Oklahoma! is considered a game-changer and a landmark, but I hope it is. Contrary to popular parlance, Hamilton is not a rap musical— it’s a Broadway musical that uses rap and jazz and many other styles of popular music to denote character; it makes musical style part of its language. This is an innovation, brilliantly employed, that deserves to influence Broadway writers going forward.
